about_the_game:
Explore this Arabian themed match 3 puzzle adventure! Begin this hand crafted world as a poor traveler who desires to seek treasures beyond your wildest expectations. Complete match 3 puzzles and gain gold to build up your own treasure room full of exciting riches.

Explore tons of scenery elements specially designed to enhance your experience through 100 levels of challenging game play puzzles. Earn star rewards for your expert skills during the time limited mode or play a relaxed version of the game and take as much time as you need. Use the bonuses you will acquire to help solve the more challenging puzzles.

This game was designed for PC and contains no in-app purchases.

  • Create your own treasure room full of riches you can purchase with gold.
  • Select between Timed or Relaxing game modes.
  • 100 Levels uniquely designed for a wide variety of game play.
  • High quality custom art and design throughout the game.
  • Supports languages in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Dutch.
  • Fast and responsive game play designed for PC's and runs great on lower end hardware.
detailed_description:
Explore this Arabian themed match 3 puzzle adventure! Begin this hand crafted world as a poor traveler who desires to seek treasures beyond your wildest expectations. Complete match 3 puzzles and gain gold to build up your own treasure room full of exciting riches.

Explore tons of scenery elements specially designed to enhance your experience through 100 levels of challenging game play puzzles. Earn star rewards for your expert skills during the time limited mode or play a relaxed version of the game and take as much time as you need. Use the bonuses you will acquire to help solve the more challenging puzzles.

This game was designed for PC and contains no in-app purchases.

  • Create your own treasure room full of riches you can purchase with gold.
  • Select between Timed or Relaxing game modes.
  • 100 Levels uniquely designed for a wide variety of game play.
  • High quality custom art and design throughout the game.
  • Supports languages in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Dutch.
  • Fast and responsive game play designed for PC's and runs great on lower end hardware.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.8
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Arabian Treasures: Midnight Match

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: This is the rags to riches story told in a match 3 puzzle adventure within an Arabian themed game!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
